short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark open tabs with tags and filter them easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lets you bookmark webpages with custom tags for easy organisation and quick access. Manage your bookmarks right from the extension without switching to a separate app - just tag, filter, and open everything from one place. Whether you're researching, reading, or collecting resources, this tool streamlines your workflow, saving you time and hassle.

Install now and take control of your bookmarks like never before!
